text: Southern Savonia or South Savo is a region in Finland. Neighbouring regions are Central Finland, P채ij채nne Tavastia, Northern Savonia, North Karelia, Kymenlaakso and South Karelia. There are three cities in Southern Savonia: Mikkeli, Pieks채m채ki and Savonlinna. == Other websites == * Official website
title: South Savo
